name: Dr.Adeline Becka
about: Dr.Adeline Becka is a Cardiology and is affiliated with NYU Langone Hospitals. She has been in practice between 10â€“20 years.

name: Dr.Smile Jhon
about: Dr.Smile Jhon  is an Orthopaedics in Bronx, New York. He received medical degree from Hacettepe University Faculty of Medicine and has been in practice between 3-5 years.

name: Dr.Jake Alex
about: Dr.Jake Alex is a doctor in Brooklyn, New York. She received her medical degree from Allama Iqbal Medical College and has been in practice between 6-10 years.

name: Dr.Alex Davidson
about: Dr.Alex Davidson (Simon) is a Haematology doctor in Bronxville, New York. She received her medical degree from The Robert Larner, M.D. College of Medicine at The University of Vermont and has been in practice between 6-10 years.

name: Dr.Zinia Zara
about: Dr.Zinia Zara is an internist in Staten Island, New York and is affiliated with multiple hospitals in the area, including Richmond University Medical Center and Staten Island University Hospital. She received her medical degree from University Osteopathic Medical Health Science and has been in practice for more than 20 years.

name: Dr.Maria
about: Dr.Maria is an Pediatrics in Oceanside, New York. He received his medical degree from State University of New York Downstate Medical Center College of Medicine and has been in practice for more than 20 years.

name: Dr.Alexender Kalvin
about: Dr.Alexender Kalvin is an advanced practice nurse. He is currently a university nursing educator and has authored multiple publications.

name: Dr.Johora
about: Dr.Johora is a psychiatrist in New York, New York. He received his medical degree from University of Tennessee College of Medicine and has been in practice for more than 20 years.
